power.name: Ego Whip
power.desc: Mental Lash (DC 1d20 + Dex Mod + DC Mod) Damage: 1d4 Dex

power.name: Empty Mind
power.desc: Hide your mind - DC Mods EW: +1 II: -2 MB: +3 MT: -3 PC: -5

power.name: Id Insinuation
power.desc: Tendrils of thought disrupt target (DC 1d20 + ST Mod + DC Mod) Damage:1d2 Str

power.name: Intellect Fortress
power.desc: Incase mind in fortress of determination - DC Mods EW: -2 II: +1 MB: +0 MT: +6 PC: +4 / Mental Hardness 3

power.name: Mental Barrier
power.desc: A construct of dissembling thoughts - DC Mods EW: -1 II: +1 MB: +0 MT: +1 PC: +3 / Mental Hardness 2

power.name: Mind Blast
power.desc: Blast the minds of all in 60ft-cone (DC 1d20 + Chr Mod + DC Mod) Damage : 1d4 Chr (nonpsionics stunned for 3d4 rounds)

power.name: Mind Thrust
power.desc: Massive assult on mental pathways (DC 1d20 + Int Mod + DC Mod) Damage: 1d2 Int

power.name: Psychic Crush
power.desc: Your will surrounds target squeezes mercilessly (DC 1d20 + Wis Mod + DC Mod)

power.name: Thought Shield
power.desc: Erect a shield of hope - DC Mods EW: -4 II: -1 MB: -2 MT: +4 PC: +2 / Mental Hardness 1

power.name: Tower of Iron Will
power.desc: Generates a bastion of thought - DC Mods EW: +3 II: +0 MB: -1 MT: +5 PC: -3 / Mental Hardness 2 (10ft-radius)

power.name: Catfall
power.desc: You recover well from a fall

power.name: Distract
power.desc: Subjects mind wanders -1 to some actions

power.name: Float
power.desc: You buoy a subject in water or liquid

power.name: Inkling
power.desc: 50% likely to know if action is good/bad

power.name: Know Direction
power.desc: You know which way is North

power.name: Trinket
power.desc: You create a short lived trinket

power.name: Astral Construct I
power.desc: Create Astral construct to fight for you

power.name: Attraction
power.desc: Subject has an attraction you specify

power.name: Biofeedback
power.desc: Take some damage as subdual damage

power.name: Conceal Thoughts
power.desc: Conceal motive +20 bluff +4 save vs mind reading

power.name: Control Light
power.desc: Adjust light levels up or down

power.name: Hustle
power.desc: You gain one extra partial action next round

power.name: Identify
power.desc: Identify single feature of psionic item

power.name: Know Location
power.desc: You know, generally, where you are

power.name: Lesser Body Adjustment
power.desc: Heal 1d8 or +1 fort save, or heal 1 abil pt.

power.name: Minor Creation
power.desc: Create one wood or cloth item

power.name: Object Reading
power.desc: You know about an objects past

power.name: Sense Link
power.desc: You sense what a subject senses

power.name: Skate
power.desc: Target slides along ground as if ice

power.name: Spider Climb
power.desc: You can walk on walls or ceilings

power.name: Animal Affinity
power.desc: Increase ability score by 1d4+1 by emulating an animal

power.name: Astral Construct II
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Augury
power.desc: Learn if action will be good or bad

power.name: Body Adjustment
power.desc: Heal 3d6, or fort save bonus, or heal 2 abil pts.

power.name: Body Equilibrium
power.desc: You can walk on non-solid surfaces

power.name: Brain Lock
power.desc: Target cant move or take actions

power.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
power.desc: Hear or See at a distance

power.name: Control Fire
power.desc: Control heat and movement of fire

power.name: Ecto Puppet
power.desc: Create an astral construct you control

power.name: Invisibility
power.desc: Subject is invis for 10min/lvl or until attacks

power.name: Knock
power.desc: Opens locked or psionically locked doors

power.name: Sense Psychoportation
power.desc: Know when others use this discipline

power.name: Sudden Minor Creation
power.desc: Quickly create wood or cloth items

power.name: Sustenance
power.desc: You can go with out food or water

power.name: Vigilance
power.desc: See through mists, murk and darkness

power.name: Astral Construct III
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Claws of the Vampire
power.desc: Your hands deal 1d8 damage and you heal

power.name: Control Sound
power.desc: You can create very specific sounds

power.name: Danger Sense
power.desc: You gain +4 insight bonus vs traps

power.name: Dimension Slide
power.desc: Move to any spot you can see

power.name: Displacement
power.desc: Attacks miss you 50% of the time

power.name: Ectoplasmic Form
power.desc: Your form becomes hard to damage

power.name: False Sensory Input
power.desc: You falsify one of subjects senses

power.name: Fate Link
power.desc: You link the fates of 2 targets

power.name: Fly
power.desc: Subject flies at a speed of 90ft

power.name: Lesser Domination
power.desc: Forces subject to obey your will

power.name: Mindlink
power.desc: You have a mental bond with others

power.name: Remote Viewing
power.desc: You see subject from a distance

power.name: Anchored Navigation
power.desc: You navigate from a fixed reference point that you mentally sense

power.name: Astral Construct IV
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Detect Remote Viewing
power.desc: You know when others spy on you remotely

power.name: Dismissal
power.desc: Forces target to return to native plane

power.name: Fabricate
power.desc: Make raw goods into finished items

power.name: Fate of One
power.desc: You can reroll an bad roll

power.name: Forced Mindlink
power.desc: Create mental bond with unwilling subject

power.name: Immovability
power.desc: You are alomst impossible to move

power.name: Mindwipe
power.desc: Subject has recent experiences wiped away

power.name: Psychofeedback
power.desc: Use power points to boost Str, Con or Dex

power.name: Quintessence
power.desc: Collapse a bit of time into a dollop

power.name: Steadfast Perception
power.desc: +4 Bonus vs illusion +2 to Spot and Search

power.name: Adapt Body
power.desc: Adapt your body to hostile enviornments

power.name: Astral Construct V
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Clairtangency
power.desc: Use far hand at any distance

power.name: Ectoplasmic Shambler
power.desc: Foglike predator deals 1pt/round to creatures it surrounds

power.name: Energy Barrier
power.desc: Convert energy attacks into harmless light

power.name: Graft Weapon
power.desc: Cause a weapon to become part of your body

power.name: Major Creation
power.desc: As minor creation plus stone and metal

power.name: Metaconcert
power.desc: Join minds with others who also use this power to create an ubermind

power.name: Metamorphosis
power.desc: Take the form of creatures or objects

power.name: Psychic Vampire
power.desc: Touch attack drains 2 power pts/lvl which you gain

power.name: Sense Psionics
power.desc: Detect Psionics over a large area

power.name: True Seeing
power.desc: See all things as they really are

power.name: Ablating
power.desc: Subject is shielded from one negate psionic effect

power.name: Astral Construct VI
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Aura Alteration
power.desc: Subject sees something it is not

power.name: Greater Biocurrent
power.desc: Deal 4d6 damage/rd to up to 4 creatures

power.name: Retrieve
power.desc: Teleport any item you see to your hand

power.name: Trace Teleport
power.desc: Learn orgin or goal of subjects teleport

power.name: Astral Construct VII
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Contingency
power.desc: Sets trigger condition for another power

power.name: Emulate Power
power.desc: Manifest any psionic power of 6th level or lower

power.name: Energy Conversion
power.desc: Convert energy attacks to one ray energy attack of your own

power.name: Etherlealness
power.desc: Travel to the ethereal plane with compainions

power.name: Improved Anchored Navigation
power.desc: You can navigate from a fixed point even across planes

power.name: Mass Domination
power.desc: Many targets subject to your will

power.name: Phase Door
power.desc: Invisible passage through wood or stone

power.name: Plane Shift
power.desc: Up to 8 subjects can travel to another plane

power.name: Power Turning
power.desc: Reflect 1d4+6 power level back at manifester

power.name: Sequester
power.desc: Subject is invisible to sight and remote viewing

power.name: Teleport without Error
power.desc: As Teleport but no off target arrivals

power.name: Ultrablast
power.desc: Mental scream deals 13d4 to all within 15ft

power.name: Astral Construct VIII
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Dream Travel
power.desc: You travel to other places through your dreams

power.name: Foresight
power.desc: Psionic senses warn you of impending danger

power.name: Improved Clairtangency
power.desc: You use telekinesis at any distance.

power.name: Iron Body
power.desc: Your body becomes living iron. Damage Reduction 50/+3

power.name: Matter Manipulation
power.desc: Increase or decrease an objects base hardness by 5.

power.name: Mind Blank
power.desc: Immune to mental/emotional effects, scrying and remotve viewing.

power.name: Mind Stone
power.desc: Store your personality against future need.

power.name: Recall Death
power.desc: Save vs Will or die, else take 3d6+15 damage.

power.name: Shadow Body
power.desc: You become a living shadow (damage reduction 50/+5)

power.name: Telekinetic Sphere
power.desc: Mobile force globe protects one subject

power.name: Teleportation Circle
power.desc: Circle teleports any creatures inside it.

power.name: Temporal Acceleration
power.desc: Your time frame accelerates for 2 rounds

power.name: True Creation
power.desc: As major creation but items are permanent.

power.name: True Domination
power.desc: Dominated subjects less likely to defy your will.

power.name: Affinity Field
power.desc: Effects that affect you also affect others.

power.name: Apopsi
power.desc: Delete the psionic power of another.

power.name: Astral Construct IX
power.desc: Create Astral Construct to fight for you

power.name: Astral Projection
power.desc: Project yourself and others into the Astral Plane.

power.name: Confidante
power.desc: You and antoher share a permanent mental bond.

power.name: Dissolution
power.desc: Disintegrate very large obecjts or creatures

power.name: Genesis
power.desc: You instigate a new demiplane in the Astral Plane.

power.name: Greater Emulation
power.desc: Manifest any psionic power of 8th level or lower.

power.name: Metafaculty
power.desc: Subject can not hide name or location from you.

power.name: Microcosm
power.desc: Subject explores imaginary world at expense of the real one.

power.name: Monster Domination
power.desc: Controls any creature but for shorter time.

power.name: Probability Travel
power.desc: You and others physically enter Astral Plane.

power.name: Psychic Chirurgery
power.desc: Repair psychic damage or impart new psionic power

power.name: Shapechange
power.desc: You become any creature, change forms 1 per/rd.

power.name: Temporal Velocity
power.desc: Your time frame accelerates for 3d4 rounds.

power.name: True Telekinesis
power.desc: Lift or move 500lbs/level at long range.
